task.summary: implement adding to favorite movies and into watchlist
implement searching movies using four possibilities
fix error message for added movie
implement loading watchlist and favorite movies
implement possibility to rate a movie
implement deleting movies from favorite and watchlist
refactoring add number of seasons for tv shows
add Recommended Movies fragment for some movie
implement possibility to return to home page without backstack returning
implement reviews for tv shows fragment
